name: Jane Austen's 8-bit Adventure
description:
Classic literature meets classic gaming in Jane Austen's 8-bit Adventure! This 2D platformer stars Jane Austen, English novelist, who finds herself in an 8-bit video game. This game was developed to run on real NES hardware from the 1980s. The Steam release brings this retro experience to modern devices!

  • Battle characters from Jane Austen's novels!
  • Explore 8-bit England!
  • Defeat enemies with a quill!
  • Restore Miss Austen's books to the 8-bit library!
  • NES ROM file included!
